message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really love it.  I'm starting at $200, but I'm open to negotiation. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $150.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While I understand your budget, $150 doesn't quite cover my costs. How about we split the difference? I'm willing to go down to $175.  Let me know what you think!
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Can you meet me at $160?
Bob, I understand your position, but $160 is still a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $165 as a final compromise.  Let's close this deal!
I'm still not sure if I can go up to $165. Can you meet me at $155?
